text: So I Married an Axe Murderer is a 1993 American romantic black comedy movie directed by Paul Weiland and starring Mike Myers, Amanda Plummer, Nancy Travis, Alec Baldwin, Mike Hagerty, Michael Richards, Brenda Fricker, Phil Hartman, Matt Doherty, Charles Grodin, Alan Arkin. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures. ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1993 romantic comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Movies adapted into television series
title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
